verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> that <WH834> walketh <WH1980> not <WH3808> in the counsel <WH6098> of the ungodly, <WH7563> nor <WH3808> standeth <WH5975> in the way <WH1870> of sinners, <WH2400> nor <WH3808> sitteth <WH3427> in the seat <WH4186> of the scornful. <WH3887>
But <WH3588> <WH518> his delight <WH2656> is in the law <WH8451> of the LORD; <WH3068> and in his law <WH8451> doth he meditate <WH1897> day <WH3119> and night. <WH3915>

And he shall be <WH1961> like a tree <WH6086> planted <WH8362> by <WH5921> the rivers <WH6388> of water, <WH4325> that <WH834> bringeth forth <WH5414> his fruit <WH6529> in his season; <WH6256> his leaf <WH5929> also shall not <WH3808> wither; <WH5034> and whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> he doeth <WH6213> shall prosper. <WH6743>
The ungodly <WH7563> are not <WH3808> so: <WH3651> but <WH3588> <WH518> are like the chaff <WH4671> which <WH834> the wind <WH7307> driveth away. <WH5086>
Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the ungodly <WH7563> shall not <WH3808> stand <WH6965> in the judgment, <WH4941> nor sinners <WH2400> in the congregation <WH5712> of the righteous. <WH6662>
For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> knoweth <WH3045> the way <WH1870> of the righteous: <WH6662> but the way <WH1870> of the ungodly <WH7563> shall perish. <WH6>
